title: Why is Lee Sin suddenly so powerful?
body: Suddenly, I've seen a skyrocket in {{champion:64}} players and they have been seeming to dominate the games I play. Am I missing something here or did people just realise how powerful he is?

replies.body:
His ult is very annoying, and it gets old versing a Lee sin every game.

But don't worry, he is getting quite a big nerf to his ult next patch, so GL until then!

It's not about his ult, or how much damage he can deal with his combo. It's about how well he can pressure top, mid and bottom lanes early on. WIth the jungle changes this has actually enhanced his ability to pressure lanes through sheer sustain in the jungle while still being healthy enough to counter jungle and duel the enemy jungle.
He is popular, and people are learning how to play him more now. But he is getting nerfed next patch so you are in luck.

He's been a very strong jungler for as long as I can remember and his highish skill cap seems to attract a lot of smurfs and with the new season people are probably hiring boosters to get them a good rank
